creator: TruTac Ltd
descriptionHtml:
TruChecks is a mobile system for drivers to complete daily vehicle inspections. TruChecks captures all of the information required by VOSA inspectors and provides type specific and configurable check lists for all vehicle and trailers.

Data is through email alerts and web-based reporting system, giving visibility and accurate vehicle management. Once a check form has been logged, it is automatically sent to the office to notify of problems.

Forms are easily recalled for inspections and workshop maintenance. Managers can configure checklists along with the order of completion and expected timeframe. Time stamped reports are immediately available and are stored electronically.
descriptionShort: TruChecks is a mobile system for drivers to complete daily vehicle inspections.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Users of our Time and Attendance system will be able to Clock in and Out via the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are excited to announce a big update to our mobile app. The updated app contains new features which includes:

- Requesting and Publishing documents (TruDocuments Premium)
- Improved Traffic page
- Dedicated accident reporting
- Improve UI for the app
- Dark/light mode
- Improved notifications
